TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 表示 Windows 文本框控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件时，用户可以在应用程序中输入文本。With the control, the user can enter text in an application. 此控件具有在标准 Windows 文本框控件中找不到的其他功能，包括多行编辑和密码字符掩码。This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing and password character masking. 通常， 控件用于显示或接受作为输入的一行文本。Typically, a control is used to display, or accept as input, a single line of text. 您可以使用 "" 和 "" 属性来启用显示或输入多行文本。You can use the and properties to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered. 将 和 属性设置为 `true`，以便在多行 控件中启用更大的文本操作。Set the and properties to `true` to enable greater text manipulation in a multiline control. > [!NOTE] > 必须将 属性设置为 `true` 以调整 控件的高度。You must set the property to `true` to adjust the height of the control. 可以通过设置 "" 属性来调整高度。You can adjust the height by setting the property. 可以通过将 属性设置为特定数量的字符来限制输入 控件中的文本量。You can limit the amount of text entered into a control by setting the property to a specific number of characters. 控件还可用于接受密码和其他敏感信息。 controls can also be used to accept passwords and other sensitive information. 您可以使用 属性来屏蔽在单行版本的控件中输入的字符。You can use the property to mask characters entered in a single-line version of the control. 使用 "" 属性可使用户只键入大写、小写或大写和小写字符与 控件的组合。Use the property to enable the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the control. 若要滚动 的内容，直到光标（插入符号）位于控件的可见区域内，可以使用 方法。To scroll the contents of the until the cursor (caret) is within the visible region of the control, you can use the method. 若要选择文本框中的文本范围，可以使用 方法。To select a range of text in the text box, you can use the method. 若要限制在 控件中输入文本，可以为 事件创建事件处理程序，以便验证在控件中输入的每个字符。To restrict text from being entered in a control, you can create an event handler for the event in order to validate each character entered in the control. 还可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`，来限制 控件中的所有数据输入。You can also restrict all entry of data in a control by setting the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 控件的大多数功能是从 类继承的。Most of the functionality of the control is inherited from the class. > > 使用启用了视觉样式的 控件将导致不正确地处理代理项字体。Using the control with visual styles enabled will cause the incorrect handling of surrogate fonts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有垂直滚动条的多行 控件。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例使用 、和 属性，使多行文本框控件对于创建文本文档很有用。This example uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父容器控件定义 的颜色和字体设置。The parent container control defines the color and font settings for the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 控件的新实例，并将字符串分配给控件的 属性。The following code example creates a new instance of the control and assigns a string to the control's property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在多行 控件中按 Enter 键时，是在控件中创建一行新文本还是激活窗体的默认按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.

value.span: 如果按 Enter 键时在多行版本的控件中创建一行新文本，则为 ；如果按 Enter 键时激活窗体的默认按钮，则为 。

span.span: if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值为 `false`，则用户必须按 CTRL + ENTER 在多行 控件中创建新行。If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline control. 如果窗体没有默认按钮，则无论此属性的值如何，ENTER 键都将始终在控件中创建新的文本行。If there is no default button for the form, the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, regardless of the value of this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有垂直滚动条的多行 控件。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例使用 、和 属性，使多行文本框控件对于创建文本文档很有用。This example uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteStringCollection ^ AutoCompleteCustomSource { System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteStringCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteStringCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个自定义 ，以便在 属性被设置为 时使用。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom to use when the property is set to .

value.span: 一个与 一起使用的 。

span.span: A to use with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ""、"" 和 "" 属性创建一个自动完成输入字符串的 ，方法是将所输入的前缀与维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀进行比较。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这对于经常输入 Url、地址、文件名或命令的 控件很有用。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 属性的使用是可选的，但必须将 属性设置为 `CustomSource`，才能使用 。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 必须同时使用 和 属性。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 操作系统可能会限制它可以同时显示的自定义字符串的数目。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合作为 控件的自动完成自定义源。The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a control. 此示例将执行下列操作：This example does the following: - 使用 属性，使 控件可以接受自定义源以实现其自动完成行为。Uses the property to enable the control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior. - 使用 属性设置值的自定义列表。Uses the property to set the custom list of values. - 使用 属性设置自动完成候选项的显示方式。Uses the property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.textbox.autocompletecustomsource/cs/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.textbox.autocompletecustomsource/vb/form1.vb#10)]

value.span: 值之一。

value.span: 以下为这些值。

span.span: The following are the values.

value.span: 将最可能的候选字符串的其余部分追加到现有的字符，并突出显示追加的字符。

span.span: Appends the remainder of the most likely candidate string to the existing characters, highlighting the appended characters.

value.span: 显示与编辑控件关联的辅助下拉列表。

span.span: Displays the auxiliary drop-down list associated with the edit control.

value.span: 此下拉列表填充了一个或多个建议完成字符串。

span.span: This drop-down is populated with one or more suggested completion strings.

value.span: 追加 和 选项。

span.span: Appends both and options.

value.span: 禁用自动完成

span.span: Disables automatic completion.

value.span: 这是默认值。

span.span: This is the default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ""、"" 和 "" 属性创建一个自动完成输入字符串的 ，方法是将所输入的前缀与维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀进行比较。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这对于经常输入 Url、地址、文件名或命令的 控件很有用。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 属性的使用是可选的，但必须将 属性设置为 `CustomSource`，才能使用 。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 必须同时使用 和 属性。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 操作系统可能会限制它可以同时显示的自定义字符串的数目。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合作为 控件的自动完成自定义源。The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a control. 此示例将执行下列操作：This example does the following: - 使用 属性，使 控件可以接受自定义源以实现其自动完成行为。Uses the property to enable the control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior. - 使用 属性设置值的自定义列表。Uses the property to set the custom list of values. - 使用 属性设置自动完成候选项的显示方式。Uses the property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ""、"" 和 "" 属性创建一个自动完成输入字符串的 ，方法是将所输入的前缀与维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀进行比较。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这对于经常输入 Url、地址、文件名或命令的 控件很有用。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 属性的使用是可选的，但必须将 属性设置为 `CustomSource`，才能使用 。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 必须同时使用 和 属性。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 在多行 控件上不起作用。 does not work on multiline controls. > [!NOTE] > 操作系统可能会限制一次可显示的自定义字符串的数目。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that can be displayed at once. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合作为 控件的自动完成自定义源。The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a control. 此示例将执行下列操作：This example does the following: - 使用 属性，使 控件可以接受自定义源以实现其自动完成行为。Uses the property to enable the control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior. - 使用 属性设置值的自定义列表。Uses the property to set the custom list of values. - 使用 属性设置自动完成候选项的显示方式。Uses the property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件是否在字符键入时修改其大小写格式。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the control modifies the case of characters as they are typed.

value.span: 枚举值中的一个值，它指定 控件是否修改字符的大小写格式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the control modifies the case of characters.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 属性更改应用程序所需的字符大小写。You can use the property to change the case of characters as required by your application. 例如，可以将在用于密码输入的 控件中输入的所有字符的大小写更改为大写或小写来强制执行密码策略。For example, you could change the case of all characters entered in a control used for password entry to uppercase or lowercase to enforce a policy for passwords. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个用于接受密码的 控件。The following code example creates a control that is used to accept a password. 此示例使用 属性将键入的所有字符更改为小写，并使用 属性将密码长度限制为8个字符。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to lowercase, and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此示例还使用 属性使密码在 控件中居中。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配给该属性的值不在该枚举的有效值范围内。

span.span: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

value.span: 默认为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在多行 控件上不起作用。 does not work on multiline controls. 当字体更改时，将不会显示你定义的任何缩进。When the font is changed, any indentation that you have defined does not appear. 若要获取缩进，请将 设置为 `true` 并重写 WM_SETFONT，而不调用基类，因此不会调用 SETMARGINS。To get indentation, set to `true` and override WM_SETFONT without calling the base class so that SETMARGINS is not called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有垂直滚动条的多行 控件。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例使用 、和 属性，使多行文本框控件对于创建文本文档很有用。This example uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBackColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnBackColorChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户在 控件中选择文本时，控件将保存选定内容。When the user selects text in a control, the control saves the selection. 当 控件获得焦点时，所选内容与 失去焦点时相同。When a control gets focus, the selection is the same as when the loses focus. 当 首次获得焦点时，将选择整个文本。When the gets focus for the first time, the entire text is selected. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property char PasswordChar { char get(); void set(char value); };
member this.PasswordChar : char with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置字符，该字符用于屏蔽单行 控件中的密码字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character used to mask characters of a password in a single-line control.

value.span: 用于屏蔽在单行 控件中输入的字符的字符。

span.span: The character used to mask characters entered in a single-line control.

value.span: 如果你不希望控件在键入时屏蔽字符，请将此属性的值设置为 "0" （U + 0000）。

span.span: Set the value of this property to '0' (U+0000) if you do not want the control to mask characters as they are typed.
The default value is '0' (U+0000).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性优先于 属性。The property has precedence over the property. 每当将 设置为 `true`时，将使用默认系统密码字符并忽略 的任何字符集。Whenever the is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by is ignored. 如果设置了 属性，则无法执行使用键盘的控件中的 "剪切" 和 "复制" 操作。When the property is set, cut and copy actions in the control using the keyboard cannot be performed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果 处于密码模式，因为 、或 `true`，则 处于受限模式下。When the is in password mode because , , or is `true`, the is in restricted mode. 在此模式下，将禁用 ，但会缓存当前 ，以便在 变得不受限制时可以还原。In this mode, the is disabled, but the current is cached so that it can be restored if the ever becomes unrestricted. 切换 是一种常见方案。Toggling the is a common scenario. 当控件处于受限模式时， 为隐藏状态。The is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode. 从设计器的角度来看，显示的 值是实际值。From the designer perspective, the value shown is the actual value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个用于接受密码的 控件。The following code example creates a control that is used to accept a password. 此示例使用 属性将键入的所有字符更改为小写，并使用 属性将密码长度限制为8个字符。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to lowercase and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此示例还使用 属性使密码在 控件中居中。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 4.6.1 中的新增项。New in 4.6.1. 在以前的版本中，当 和 属性都设置为 `true.`时， 中的 Ctrl 键无法选择所有文本。In previous versions, the Ctrl-A shortcut key in a failed to select all text when the and properties were both set to `true.`. 当 和 属性都设置为时，此方法将启用 Ctrl 键以选择所有文本 `true.`This method enables the Ctrl-A shortcut key to select all text when the and properties are both set to `true.` 面向 .NET Framework 版本4.0 到4.6 的应用程序可以通过将以下内容添加到 app.config 文件的 `` 部分来利用此方法：Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.0 through 4.6 can take advantage of this method by adding the following to the `` section of the app.config file: ```xml ``` 面向 .NET Framework 版本4.6.1 或更高版本的应用程序可以通过将以下内容添加到 app.config 文件的 `` 部分来选择退出此行为：Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.6.1 or newer can opt out of this behavior by adding the following to the `` section of the app.config file: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果 app.config 文件中已包含 `AppContextSwitchOverrides` 项，请将新的键值合并到现有的密钥中。If the app.config file already contains an `AppContextSwitchOverrides` key, merge the new key value into the existing key. 例如，`` 。For example, ``.

summary.span: 获取或设置哪些滚动条应出现在多行 控件中。

span.span: Gets or sets which scroll bars should appear in a multiline control.

value.span: 枚举值之一，它指示多行 控件显示时是不带滚动条、带有水平滚动条、带有垂直滚动条还是同时带有这两种滚动条。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether a multiline control appears with no scroll bars, a horizontal scroll bar, a vertical scroll bar, or both.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则不会显示水平滚动条，而与 属性的值无关。Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the property is set to `true`, regardless of the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有垂直滚动条的多行 控件。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用 、和 属性，使多行 控件对于创建文本文档很有用。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline control useful for creating text documents. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中文本的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how text is aligned in a control.

value.span: 枚举值之一，指定控件中文本的对齐方式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies how text is aligned in the control.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来对齐 中的文本，以匹配窗体上的文本布局。You can use this property to align the text within a to match the layout of text on your form. 例如，如果您的控件都位于窗体的右侧，则可以将 属性设置为 `HorizontalAlignment.Right`，而文本将与控件的右侧对齐，而不是与默认左对齐。For example, if your controls are all located on the right side of the form, you can set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, and the text will be aligned with the right side of the control instead of the default left alignment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个用于接受密码的 控件。The following code example creates a control that is used to accept a password. 此示例使用 属性将键入的所有字符更改为小写，并使用 属性将密码长度限制为8个字符。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to lowercase, and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此示例还使用 属性使密码在 控件中居中。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您查明事件发生的时间，并可帮助您进行调试。This report helps you find out when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `TextBox1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
